The ranking system in this game is terrible, people leave immediately but are only punished 30 minutes of ranked play. So much fun to try and carry a bot who is impossible to control and only rushes down middle. If you chose to play, don't play ranked.

dis is good game. very gud game. but rank-up system thing is trash. i literally won over 13 times, then no rank-up. gg ez pz

This game is like crack. you know it's bad for you. But you're addicted because it's still probably one of the more competent FPS out there. But it's buggy, riddled with hackers and has very little content (I do not count community workshop)   Considering that it's a game that's come out 2012, and no half life 3, left for dead 3 or portal 3 in sight, having to rely on community to make most of its content, I can only boil this down to laziness.
